content.question: Which of the following best describes Zaha Hadid's MAXXI National Museum of XXI Century Arts in Rome?

choices.label: A simple exterior of concrete pierced with rows of small windows
A complex exterior constructed of multiple interlocking, reflective surfaces
A simple interior with a single modular shape for all the galleries
A complex interior of geometric shapes and curvilinear elements

content.answer: A complex interior of geometric shapes and curvilinear elements

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
